entry.title: DBSteward 1.2.1 (stable)
entry.content:
DBSteward 1.2.1 Release
Supported Platform DDL Generation: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mssql10 - Microsoft SQL Server 2008 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
Stubbed Platform DDL generation: * oracle10g - Oracle 10g
Supported Platform Structure Extraction into XML: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mysql5 - MySQL 5

entry.content:
DBSteward 1.2.0 Release
Supported Platform DDL Generation: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mssql10 - Microsoft SQL Server 2008 * mysql5 - MySQL 5

entry.title: DBSteward 1.1.1 (beta)
entry.content:
API 1.1 includes CLI and XML definition changes for stage management, based on user group feedback.
Supported Database Platform DDL generation: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mssql10 - Microsoft SQL Server 2008
Stubbed Database Platform DDL generation: * mysql4 - MySQL 4 * oracle10g - Oracle 10g
Supported db structure dump into DBSteward XML: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8
